name: NSTrackingSeparatorToolbarItem
desc: A toolbar separator that aligns with the vertical split view in the same window.

items.name: init(identifier: NSToolbarItem.Identifier, splitView: NSSplitView, dividerIndex: Int)
items.desc: Creates a new tracking separator toolbar item and configures it to align with the divider of the split view.

items.name: var dividerIndex: Int
items.desc: The index of the split view divider to align with the tracking separator.

items.name: var splitView: NSSplitView
items.desc: The vertical split view to align with the toolbar separator.
